entries.title: Adult Swim cuts ties with Justin Roiland following domestic abuse allegations
entries.description: Adult Swim announced Tuesday that it has cut ties with Justin Roiland, the star and co-creator of the animated comedy series “Rick and Morty," as he faces felony domestic violence charges.

entries.title: DOJ files second antitrust suit against Google, seeks to break up its ad business
entries.description: The U.S. Justice Department on Tuesday filed its second antitrust lawsuit against Google in just over two years.

entries.title: Amazon launches a subscription prescription drug service
entries.description: Amazon is adding a prescription drug discount program to its growing health care business.

entries.title: Scans reveal secrets of Egypt's mummified 'golden boy,' buried for 2,300 years
entries.description: Known as Egypt’s “golden boy,” the mummified remains of a teenager buried 2,300 years ago have been revealed after they were "digitally unwrapped" by scientists.

entries.title: Twitter faces lawsuits over unpaid rent for U.S. HQ, U.K. office
entries.description: More landlords are taking Twitter to court over unpaid rent, this time at the social media company’s headquarters in San Francisco and its British offices.
